description:
Purpose: To deploy Cloudera Bigdata Cluster in AWS.
1) Create an isolated network for the cluster - VPC, Public & Private Subnet, Route, Network Security Group will be created.
2) Provision EC2 instance and associate it to the newly created network.
3) Install Cloudera in the instance using user data script.

Inputs Required: Instance Parameters - Instance Type, Keypair Name, Network Parameters - NAT Instance Type, VPC CIDR, Public DMZ CIDR, Private Subnet CIDR, Remote Access CIDR and Availability Zone.

Use case(s): Can be used to create a Cloudera Bigdata cluster on the go with an isolated VPC and network configurations.
name: AWS_Deploy_Cloudera_Bigdata_Cluster_New_VPC
